name: r1337-certmanage
description: Manages SSL certificates and keys via Chef Vault
long_description: This Chef cookbook will manage SSL certificates and keys through the use of Chef Vault.

recipes.r1337-certmanage::default: Call this recipe to load Chef Vault and run the certificate and key management recipes
recipes.r1337-certmanage::prereqs: Configure the base requirements for Route 1337 style SSL certificate management
recipes.r1337-certmanage::certdeploy: Deploy the SSL certificates and their corresponding keys from Chef Vault
recipes.r1337-certmanage::maintenance: Perform cleanup of removed certs and keys as well as unmanaged files in the /data/ssl directory
